name: figureman ahoge
description:
The world is under attack by sentient chestnuts, these naughty hard heads never say thank you and always cut in line before a long queue. It is time for Figureman Ahoge to teach them some manners by hitting them with his sword, because a little bit of tough love is always effective.

This is for the game jam: https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-draw-but-want-to-make-a-game-again. This game might be updated before the deadline of this game jam, so stay tuned!

Newly updated to have sound effects and shield ability!
